CustomField.description: At what time the fields_needed must be provided. If this date is in the past, the account is already in bad standing, and providing Fields Needed is necessary. If this date is in the future, Fields Needed must be provided for good standing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: At what time the fields_needed must be provided. If this date is in the past, the account is already in bad standing, and providing Fields Needed is necessary. If this date is in the future, Fields Needed must be provided for good standing.
CustomField.label: Verification Due By
